name: SUPER FIGHTING JAM
description:
■About this game
An original 2D fighting game created by an amateur who knows nothing about programming.
You can choose between two types of battle systems, a normal mode with a high degree of freedom and a classic mode where you can enjoy ground battles.
Special moves and super special moves can be performed with a single button, so you can easily control your character.
You can play with keyboard and game controller.

■overview
・An exciting match with a sophisticated battle system!
・A fast-paced, high-speed battle where bargaining takes place in an instant!
・Game design that requires an offensive play style!

■basic operation
　　A button:・・・Punch ① button
　　B button・・・Kick ① button
　　C button・・・Punch ② button
　　D button・・・Kick ② button
　　SP button・・・special move button
　　DA button・・・ Dash button
　　SA button・・・super special move button
　　TH button・・・Throw button
START button・・・Start button

■Controller setting method (Options ⇒ Input Settings ⇒ Keyboard or controller button config)
Up・・・↑
Down・・・↓
LEFT・・・←
RIGHT・・・→
　　A・・・A button
　　B・・・C button
　　C・・・SP button
　　X・・・B button
　　Y・・・D button
　　Z・・・DA button
START・・・START button
　　D・・・SA button
　　W・・・TH button
MENU・・・MENU/BACK button

■About online match
By entering the IP address in the network menu, it is possible to play online with a P2P connection.

■Notes
・Can be used for distribution, video posting, images, and secondary creations other than fighting games (regardless of R18).
・Game titles and character copyrights (excluding some character clothing) belong to Amenofuchio.
・Please use at your own risk

■ A word from the author
The battle system of this game has been released unfinished due to the author's technical problems.
Bug reports are accepted via Twitter DM, but I don't know if it can be handled.
While playing the game, there are likely to be many areas where you are dissatisfied, but we appreciate your understanding.
